items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes. You can cancel whenever you like and retain access until the current billing cycle ends.

items.question: Do upgrades take effect immediately?
items.answer: Absolutely. Upgrading unlocks all features instantly so you can start using them right away.

items.question: Does the Free plan expire?
items.answer: No. The Free plan is available indefinitely with a limit of three campaigns.

items.question: How do enterprise customizations work?
items.answer: Contact our sales team and we will tailor a plan to your requirements, including bespoke features and integrations.

items.question: How do I use a membership code?
items.answer: Enter your membership code in the "Redeem membership code" section and your Professional subscription will be extended automatically.
